laboratory_examinations.findings: Increased free T4 (fT4) and free T3 (fT3) with suppressed TSH in the index patient. Normal fT4 levels in third child (IV.3) at age 8. Youngest child (IV.4) showed TSH suppression at 6 months, with fT4 at 1.37 ng/dL still normal.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: All thiamazol-treated children show normal fT4 and fT3 values during treatment for varying durations (3 years for IV.1, 2 years for IV.2, 1 year for IV.3, and 1.5 years for IV.4).

laboratory_examinations.findings: TSH levels were suppressed: TSH/H110210.01 mU/L in the youngest boy (IV.4).
